content:
Coronavirus continues to cancel sporting events including NBA, NHL, NCAA, IHSAA and more
Don't have an account? Get the news Let friends in your social network know what you are reading about Here's a look at the growing list of sporting events that are being cancelled, suspended or otherwise affected due to the coronavirus concerns. A link has been sent to your friend's email address.
Indianapolis Star • 3/12/2020
Newark Mayor On Coronavirus: Cancel 'Non-Essential Group Events'
The administration of Newark Mayor Ras Baraka said that due to growing concerns about COVID-19, all "non-essential public gatherings" should be cancelled for the next 30 days. (File Photo: Shutterstock) NEWARK,
Patch • 3/12/2020
More Austin Venues Cancel, Postpone Events Amid Coronavirus
As concern grows over potential spread of COVID-19, Frank Erwin Center and Blanton Museum officials alter their scheduling. AUSTIN, TX — Amid heightened concern over the growing new coronavirus threat,

Generosity amid coronavirus fears: Flowers from cancelled event donated to Eger
“We decided to cancel the event last-minute, and I was on the hook for thousands of dollars of flowers ... He said the flowers were already ordered by the time the organization decided not to have a large public gathering amid fears of the coronavirus spread. ‘A BIG TREAT’ Profeta said she displayed the floral arrangements throughout ...
SILive • 3/12/2020
Both ViacomCBS and NBCUniversal Cancel May Upfront Events, Will Go Digital-Only
ViacomCBS and NBCUniversal became the first two media companies to cancel their upfronts week events in May as result of coronavirus, and both will switch to digital-only presentations. ViacomCBS said today it has scrapped its annual CBS event scheduled for Wednesday, May 13 at Carnegie Hall. The merged network will instead create a video ...
Adweek • 3/12/2020
Sources: City to Ask All Events of 1,000 or More People to Cancel Due to Coronavirus
Well, the coronavirus in Philadelphia just reached a new level. According to three sources who were on a conference call with city officials on Thursday morning, the city is asking the organizers of all events expected to draw 1,000 or more attendees to cancel those events. The invitation to the conference call went out via email to numerous ...

NBC and CBS cancel live upfronts due to coronavirus outbreak

Slefo - 7 months ago Both companies will stream their events, while NBC will also televise its presentation

CBS and NBCU cancel live advertiser pitch events because of coronavirus
CBS and NBC Universal said Thursday they will no longer hold live presentations for the advertising community this spring, instead opting to release video presentations.

Coronavirus Cancellation Tracker: Millions Are Changing Plans After Events Cancelled Or Rescheduled
Millions of people have been forced to change their plans as live events around the world are canceled or migrated online. Our tracker keeps up with all the latest changes.

Coronavirus cancellations: From E3 to the 2020 NBA season, a list of events hit
Industries from tech to sports have been rattled by the virus. Here's the growing list of events that have been impacted. The novelcoronavirus continues to wreak havoc in industries around the world,
CNET • 3/12/2020
Coronavirus Prompts Call to Cancel, Postpone Large Events Across State
Smaller events must be limited to no more than 250 people and can only take place if organizers can implement social distancing of six feet per person and gatherings of people who are at higher risk for severe illness from coronavirus should be limited to no more than 10 people and also follow the social-distancing guidelines, the statement said.
Times of San Diego • 3/12/2020
Michigan football cancels pro-day event amid coronavirus outbreak
Amid the growing coronavirus outbreak in the United States and abroad, Michigan has opted to cancel its “pro day” event in Ann Arbor, the athletic department announced Thursday afternoon. Even after the school announced the canceling of classes and large events on Wednesday, the event -- expected to draw more than a dozen football players ...

Although Japan has only confirmed 1,264 cases of coronavirus as of March 11, the CDC has issued a Level 2 travel ... Beyond timelines, many artists are also taking major financial hits from the cancellation of numerous events. Airbnb is a popular and often cheaper alternative to hotels for many travelers, but in a recent statement the company ...
Chicago Tribune • 3/12/2020
NCAA basketball tournaments cancel in response coronavirus threat
Just a day after the NCAA announced that conference tournaments would continue on without paid fans in the wake of the coronavirus outbreak, several of the conferences moved to cancel altogether. NCAA president Mark Emmert issued a statement on Wednesday announcing that championship events would continue but “with only essential staff and ...
Fox News • 3/12/2020
SC parents, students brace for coronavirus impact, raise school cancellation concerns
While no public schools in South Carolina have closed so far, some parents fear that not enough is being done to manage the spread of the virus proactively. As of Thursday afternoon, there were 10 cases of the coronavirus reported in South Carolina. Two have been confirmed by the federal Centers for Disease Control. In order to address the ...
Post and Courier Charleston • 3/12/2020
A running list of canceled events from the coronavirus outbreak
Upcoming events will face a tough question. Health officials recommend social distancing. So should organizations cancel their conferences and events to stop the spread of the coronavirus? We’ve put together a running list of events that have been canceled since the outbreak began. This story will be updated.
deseret • 3/12/2020
Members of Congress close Michigan offices, cancel public events due to coronavirus concerns

U.S. Rep. Debbie Dingell, D-Dearborn, is canceling town halls and other in-person events. Dingell asked ...

Several local events in York, Chester and Lancaster counties have been canceled or modified due to coronavirus, or COVID-19, concern. As groups decide on upcoming events of interest, we’ll keep a running list here of changes. Also, if anyone is the ...

Lee’s Summit cancels Emerald Isle Parade, but says pub crawl will go on as scheduled
“After careful thought and much deliberation, Downtown Lee’s Summit Main Street has decided to cancel this year’s Emerald Isle Parade, scheduled for Saturday, March 14,” a spokesperson for the city said in a news release. The city said between the threat of weather and growing concerns of coronavirus, they believe the best decision for ...

This month, as the coronavirus spread across the U.S., many scientists and medical professionals ... Fortunately, the bioethics community isn't alone: In recent days Harvard and other universities moved classes online, and major events such as the South By Southwest festival have been canceled. So you have a big event coming up, here's some ...
Newsday • 3/12/2020
College football coronavirus updates: Ohio State, Notre Dame, Michigan cancel spring games, limit recruiting
As the NCAA announced Wednesday that the 2020 NCAA Tournament would proceed without fans in the stands and only a limited number of people in attendance at its games, universities across the country weighed how to handle sporting events on their on campuses.
CBSSports.com • 3/12/2020
Coronavirus causes A-10 Tournament to cancel just before UMass-VCU tips off
Moments before UMass and VCU were set to tipoff in their first Atlantic 10 Tournament games at the Barclays Center in Brooklyn, teams were instructed to leave the floor as the remainder of the event has been canceled due to concerns due to coronavirus. There will be a press conference at 12:30 p.m. The Atlantic 10 held its two first-round games ...
MassLive • 3/12/2020
Orleans Parish School Board declares emergency over coronavirus as schools cancel gatherings
The Orleans Parish School Board on Thursday unanimously passed a state of local emergency for the city's collection of public schools as many institutions, public and private, starting announcing cancellation of field trips and other large-scale events over coronavirus concerns.

Coronavirus and entertainment: Here’s what to know about cancellations in Chicago and around the world
and cultural events. The Prague Film Festival has also been canceled. Zac Brown Band, Pentatonix cancel concerts Zac Brown Band and Pentatonix are the latest musicians to cancel concerts because of public health concerns and performance restrictions due to the growing coronavirus outbreak. Zac Brown Band said it was postponing the spring leg of ...
Daily Press • 3/12/2020
Colgate, Patriot League will cancel spring sports amid coronavirus pandemic
Syracuse, N.Y. — The Patriot League will pull the plug on its spring sports season through the remainder of the academic year, following the lead of the Ivy League amid the global coronavirus pandemic ... winter sports teams and athletes to compete in NCAA championship events. That includes Boston University’s men’s basketball team ...
syracuse.com • 3/12/2020
Organizers cancel Apple Valley Waste Senior All-Star Classic amid coronavirus concerns
Organizers of the Apple Valley Waste Senior All-Star Classic have decided to cancel this year's event amid concerns surrounding the coronavirus. Event director Bill Wagner made the announcement on Thursday morning after consulting with representatives of the title sponsor and other stakeholders. This is a one-time cancellation and the high ...
The Baltimore Sun • 3/12/2020
Coronavirus in Oregon: Portland-area districts cancel field trips, assemblies, ban public from sporting events
Portland Public Schools has cancelled assemblies, field trips and will bar the public from attending sporting events following guidance issued by Oregon Gov. Kate Brown to stem the spread of coronavirus Wednesday. School board meetings will also be closed to the public but will be live-streamed. The ban starts Thursday and will last for 30 days.
Oregonian • 3/12/2020

Fan leave the Golden 1 Center after an NBA game in Sacramento, California was postponed as a precaution against the Coronavirus on March 11 ... “Man we cancelling sporting events, school, office work, etc etc. What we really need to cancel is 2020!” Dave Zirin TwitterDave Zirin is the sports editor of The Nation. Kansas City mayor declares state of emergency over coronavirus, canceling large events
Kansas City Mayor Quinton Lucas has issued a state of emergency, forcing all events with more than 1,000 people to cancel and halting non-essential travel for city employees ... local officials and organizations have taken to stem the spread of the novel coronavirus, or COVID-19, which has infected more than 1,000 people in the U.S. Only ...
